content:

title: Guest Services Assistant (Temporary) Job at Destiny Suites
content:
Destiny Suites is the umbrella name of the guest houses of the Dream Centre of the Life Oasis International Church, Osogbo. Destiny Suites will be in full operation between 5th of July and 13th of July, 2025 because our church's convention, The Annual God Of Breakthroughs Convention and Homecoming (GOBC&H) 2025, will be holding within that period.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Guest Services Assistant (Temporary)
Job Location: Osogbo, Osun
Employment Type: Temporary, 9 Days
Duration: July 5th – July 13th, 2025
Shift: 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM OR 8:00 PM to 8:00 AM daily (12-hour shift)
Dress Code: White Shirt and Black Trouser (males) /Skirt (for females).

Job Summary


	We are seeking reliable and courteous individuals to join our team as Guest Services Assistants during a special 9-day period.
	If you're a Christian and you enjoy creating a warm and welcoming experience for guests, this opportunity is for you.


Key Responsibilities


	Welcome and attend to guests professionally
	Handle check-ins, check-outs, and guest inquiries
	Support housekeeping and laundry duties when required
	Ensure cleanliness and orderliness in common areas
	Respond promptly to guest needs and complaints


Requirements


	Previous experience in hospitality or customer service is an advantage
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to multitask and stay professional under pressure
	Must be available for all 9 days (July 5–13). These include 2 days of training.
	Must adhere to the white and black dress code daily.


Salary
N30,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume to: gobchadmin@dreamcentre.org using the Job Title as the subject of the email.

title: Executive Assistant Job at Premium Links
content:
Premium Links, a firm with topnotch advertising skills, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant
Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities and Duties
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Calendar Management: Scheduling, coordinating, and managing the executive's appointments, meetings, and travel arrangements.
	Communication: Drafting and editing emails, memos, reports, and presentations, as well as screening and prioritizing incoming communications.
	Administrative Tasks: Maintaining records, filing documents, preparing expense reports, and ordering office supplies.
	Travel Planning: Coordinating flights, accommodations, and transportation for the executive's travel.
	Confidentiality: Handling confidential information with discretion and integrity.
	Meeting Coordination: Organizing meetings, taking minutes, and distributing action items.
	Project Support: Assisting with special projects, research, and analysis as needed.
	Liaison: Acting as a point of contact for the executive, connecting them with internal and external parties.
	Process Improvement: Identifying areas for process improvement and implementing efficient administrative systems.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an OND / HND / BSc Degree with 2+ years work experience.


Required Skills:
Organizational Skills:


	Calendar Management: Effectively managing the executive's schedule, including meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements.
	Time Management: Prioritizing tasks, meeting deadlines, and effectively using time to support the executive's needs.
	Project Management: Assisting with planning and execution of projects, often including tasks like event planning or implementation of new systems.
	Document Control: Maintaining and organizing records, ensuring accurate and easy retrieval of information.


Communication Skills:


	Verbal and Written Communication: Communicating clearly and effectively with various stakeholders, including internal and external contacts.
	Active Listening: Understanding and responding to the executive's needs and instructions.
	Interpersonal Skills: Building strong relationships with colleagues, clients, and other stakeholders.


Technical Skills:


	Software Proficiency: Familiarity with office software suites like Microsoft Office or Google Workspace.
	Data Entry: Accurately inputting and maintaining data in various systems.
	Typing and Email Management: Efficiently typing documents and managing email correspondence.


Soft Skills:


	Problem-Solving: Identifying and resolving issues, often requiring independent thinking and decision-making.
	Attention to Detail: Ensuring accuracy and thoroughness in all tasks, including documents and presentations.
	Adaptability: Adjusting to changing priorities and demands in a fast-paced environment.
	Emotional Intelligence: Understanding and managing emotions, building rapport with others, and navigating complex situations with tact.
	Confidentiality and Discretion: Maintaining the confidentiality of sensitive information and exercising discretion in all interactions.
	Professionalism: Maintaining a professional demeanor in all interactions and representing the executive effectively.
	Proactiveness: Anticipating needs and taking initiative to address them.
	Multitasking: Effectively managing multiple tasks and responsibilities simultaneously.


Salary
N120,000 - N160,000 per month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Premiumlinks198@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
